front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for Route Reflection in Border Gateway Protocol (BGP-4)

abstract.t: This memo is an extension to the SNMP MIB. It specifies an IABstandards track protocol for the Internet community, and requestsdiscussion and suggestions for improvements. This memo extendsthe MIB defined in [BGP-MIB].Distribution of this memo is unlimited. Please forward comments toidr@merit.net.
